channel.description: Nigeria's Premiere and Leading Private University

item.title: HOME
item.dc:creator: agb
item.content:encoded:
JOINT UNIVERSITIES PRELIMINARY EXAMINATIONS BOARD (JUPEB) Admission into the JUPEB Programme for 2020/2021 Session!!! Applications are hereby invited from suitably qualified candidates for admission into the Joint Universities Preliminary Examinations Board (JUPEB) Programme for 2020/2021 Session. The application will run from August 12, 2020, to October 10, 2020. The programme leads to the award of JUPEB certificate which enables candidates to gain Direct Entry Admissions into their respective programmes at the Igbinedion University, Okada, and other JUPEB - affiliated universities in Nigeria. Contact phone numbers: 08034331960, 08072072611
FEE STRUCTURE Application fee: N10,000 School Fees: N150,000 Acceptance Fee: N50,000 Note: On successful admission, pay acceptance fee of N50,000 PAYMENT DETAILS All payments should made through the Igbinedion University account number provided below Access Bank; Account Number: 0787077169; Account Name: IUO JUPEB

item.title: Application Method
item.dc:creator: agb
item.content:encoded:
Interested applicants who have the minimum entry requirement can pick our Admission Forms from our campus or any commercial bank nationwide (via bank draft). Application forms could also be completed online through our University website: http://www.iuokada.edu.ng/jupeb/registration_form/index.php. Interested applicants should fill the form online, and make a payment of ten thousand naira to Access Bank, account number 0787077169. The account name is IUO JUPEB. After filling the forms, print out three copies in colour and bring to the IUO JUPEB CENTRE. Completed Applications will be processed within 48 hours after completion and applicants will be duly informed of the outcome.
  • All Candidates are required to use valid e-mail addresses and PERSONAL Telephone Numbers.
  • Applicants are to note that 2018/2019 Preliminary Entrance Exam holds at our main campus.
  • Candidates are advised to follow the Application Instructions very carefully and ensure they select the Correct SUBJECT COMBINATION. Failure to do so may adversely affect the Candidate.
SUBJECT COMBINATION DETAILS 
  1. Biology, Chemistry, Physics (BCP) goes for any of these programs or courses
Microbiology, Industrial Chemistry, Biochemistry, Pharmacy, Medicine, Public Health Sciences, Optometry, Physiology, Anatomy, Medical Laboratory Science, Nursing, Food Science and Technology.
  1. Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics (CMP) goes for any of these programs or courses
computer science, Civil Engineering , Computer Engineering, Electrical Electronic, Mechanical Engineering, Petroleum Engineering, Chemical Engineering
  1. Any of the subject combination under Education and Arts qualifies you to take any course of your choice from the Education and Arts faculty.
  1. Any of the subject combination under Management Science qualifies you to take any course of your choice from the Management and Social Science faculty.
  1. Any of the subject combination under Social Science qualifies you to take any course of your choice from the Social Science faculty.
  1. Any of the subject combination under Law qualifies you to take any course of your choice from the Law faculty.
  1. International students who have A' Level subjects in the relevant field of study are qualified to apply under JUPEB program.

item.title: CONTACT
item.dc:creator: agb
item.content:encoded: Thank you for your interest in the College of Arts and Social Sciences at Igbinedion University, Okada. We hope to ease the process of applying by addressing your questions as quickly as possible. Please kindly reach us by filling the form below:

item.title: Subject Combinations
item.dc:creator: agb
item.content:encoded:
FACULTY AND SUBJECT COMBINATIONS Education & Arts
  • Economics, Government, Literature in English (GLE)
  • Economics, Government, Mathematics (EGM)
  • Government, Literature in English, Christian Religious Studies (GLR)
  • Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics (CMP)
Social Science
  • Economics, Geography OR Government, Mathematics (EGM)
  • Economics, Literature in English, Government (ELG)
  • Biology, Economics, Geography OR Government (BEG)
  • Government, Literature in English, Christian Religious Studies (GLR)
Management Science
  • Economics, Government, Mathematics (EGM)
  • Business Studies, Economics, Government (BEG)
  • Accounting, Economics, Geography OR Government (AEG)
  • Accounting, Business Studies, Geography OR Government (ABG)
Law
  • Government, Literature in English, Religious Studies (GLR)
  • Economics, Government, Literature in English (EGL)
Engineering & Technology
  • Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics (CMP)
  • Biology, Chemistry, Physics (BCP)
Medicine & Health Sciences Biology, Chemistry, Physics (BCP) Pharmacy Biology, Chemistry, Physics (BCP) Science
  • Biology, Chemistry, Physics (BCP)
  • Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics (CMP)
Candidates are to note that the above listed subject combinations meet the requirements (as applicable) for admission into Degree Programmes in the Arts, Management Science, Social Sciences, Sciences, Engineering and Medicine and Health Sciences, Pharmacy courses in IgbinedionUniversity, Okada and other Universities in Nigeria, and abroad.

item.title: Eligibility
item.dc:creator: agb
item.content:encoded: Applications are hereby invited from suitably qualified candidates for admission into the Joint Universities Preliminary Examinations Board (JUPEB) Programme for 2020/2021 Session. The Programme leads to the award of JUPEB Certificate which enables the candidate to gain Direct Entry admissions (200 level) into Igbinedion University, Okada and other Universities in Nigeria and abroad. Eligibility Eligible Candidates must possess a minimum of Credits Level Pass at maximum of two (2) sittings in at least five (5) subjects (inclusive of English Language) relevant to the candidate’s desired course of study in the University. Duration The duration of the Programme is a minimum of one academic session of two Semesters.

item.title: Method of Application
item.dc:creator: agb
item.content:encoded:
Interested applicants should fill the form online, and make a payment of ten thousand naira to Access Bank, account number 0787077169. The account name is IUO JUPEB. After filling the forms, print out three copies in colour and bring to the IUO JUPEB CENTRE. Completed applications will be processed within 48 hours after completion and applicants will be duly informed of the outcome.
  • All Candidates are required to use valid e-mail addresses and PERSONAL Telephone Numbers.
  • Applicants are to note that 2020/2021 Preliminary Entrance Exam holds at our main campus.
  • Candidates are advised to follow the Application Instructions very carefully and ensure they select the Correct SUBJECT COMBINATION. Failure to do so may adversely affect the Candidate.
SUBJECT COMBINATION DETAILS 
  1. Biology, Chemistry, Physics (BCP) goes for any of these programs or courses
Microbiology, Industrial Chemistry, Biochemistry, Pharmacy, Medicine, Public Health Sciences, Optometry, Physiology, Anatomy, Medical Laboratory Science, Nursing, Food Science and Technology.
  1. Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics (CMP) goes for any of these programs or courses
computer science, Civil Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electrical Electronic, Mechanical Engineering, Petroleum Engineering, Chemical Engineering
  1. Any of the subject combinations under Education and Arts qualifies you to take any course of your choice from the Education and Arts faculty.
  2. Any of the subject combinations under Management Science qualifies you to take any course of your choice from the Management and Social Science faculty.
  3. Any of the subject combinations under Social Science qualifies you to take any course of your choice from the Social Science faculty.
  4. Any of the subject combinations under Law qualifies you to take any course of your choice from the Law faculty.
  5. International students who have A' Level subjects in the relevant field of study are qualified to apply under JUPEB program.

item.content:encoded:

  5. International students who have A' Level subjects in the relevant field of study are qualified to apply under JUPEB program.

item.title: Application Method 2

item.content:encoded:
Interested applicants who have the minimum entry requirement can pick our Admission Forms from our campus or any commercial bank nationwide (via bank draft). Application forms could also be completed online through our University website: http://www.iuokada.edu.ng/jupeb/registration_form/index.php. item.title: OBJECTIVES
item.dc:creator: agb
item.content:encoded:
Objectives | Curriculum | Registration | Graduation Requirement

OBJECTIVES OF THE DEGREE PROGRAMME
  • Provide training in the principles of economics and their application appropriate to the type of degree concerned: single, joint and combined studies;
  • Stimulate students intellectually through the study of economics and to lead them to appreciate its application to a range of problems and its relevance in a variety of contexts;
  • Provide a firm foundation of knowledge about the workings of an economy and to develop the relevant skills for the constructive use of that knowledge in a range of settings;
  • Develop in students the ability to apply the analytical tools, knowledge and skills acquired to solution of societies’ economic problems,
  • Equip students with appropriate tools of analyses to tackle issues and problems of economic policies;
  • Develop in students, through the study of economics, a range of transferable skills that will be of value in employment and self – employment;
  • Provide students with analytical skills and the ability to develop simplified frameworks for studying the real world;
  • Provide students with the knowledge and skill base, from which they can proceed to further studies in Economics, related areas or in interdisciplinary areas that involve Economics; and
  • Generate in students an appreciation of the economic dimensions of wider social and political issues.
